and: *taps you with a tendril, which has given you information of what it can build.

and.no:
[50 meat, 2h] Core Expansion
Expands the hivemind's core.

yes.no:
[150 meat, 8h] Core Expansion
Expands the hivemind's core.

[430 meat, 1d12h] Core Expansion
Expands the hivemind's core, as well as enhancing the surrounding walls.

[500 meat, 8h] Northern Room
Creates a room up to the north.

and.no:
[250 meat, 50 flesh, 1d] Meatfarm
(Northern Room)
Converts the northern section into a meat-generating room.

[300 meat, 200 flesh, 1d12h] Bio-organic Splicer
(Northern Room)
Dedicate the northern room for a bio-organic splicer.

yes.no:
[375 meat, 375 flesh, 2d] Bio-organic Modifier
(Northern Room)
Dedicate the northern room for a bio-organic modifier.

[300 meat, 400 flesh, 2d] Bio-organic Hatchery
(Northern Room)
Dedicate the northern room for a bio-organic hatchery.

[500 meat, 8h] Eastern Room
Creates a room up to the east.
